trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parameter is input-only, output-only, bidirectional, or a stored procedure return value parameter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx$xxxx$ xxxxxx$xxxx$ xxxxxxxxxxxxx$ xx x xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the parameter accepts null values.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue if null values are accepted; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the value of the parameter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
